summary: Concatenates the given input data strings into a unique output data string.
description:
A Separator setting can be provided to separate each string by the specified charaters.
This block is dynamic thus the input data count can be changed using the block configuration dialog.

dataPorts.Output String: the result of the string concatenation.

controlPorts.Out: is activated when the process is completed.

settings.Separator: the string separator to be used between each given input data string.
